As he pushed me onto the bed he said, Show me your rack, show me your boobs. At this point he was naked still, the woman said. I said no.
They kept asking me I said, No, stop.

articles.title: Sheffield Shield Final: The controversial rule change robbing Bulls of big advantage in - Fox Sports
articles.description: As he chases his first Sheffield Shield title, Queensland captain Usman Khawaja believes the five-day match against NSW starting Thursday at Allan Border Field will be decided by the two best spinners in the country.
articles.content:
On the eve of the Shield final, Khawaja also hit out at the bonus-point system which be used to declare a result if no side wins outright.
